io.servicetalk.opentracing.http

Class TracingHttpServiceFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.servicetalk.opentracing.http.TracingHttpServiceFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StreamingHttpServiceFilterFactory

    public class TracingHttpServiceFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements StreamingHttpServiceFilterFactory
    A StreamingHttpService that supports open tracing.

    Append this filter before others that are expected to to see Scope for this request/response. Filters appended after this filter that use operators with the after* prefix on response meta data or the response payload body (e.g. Publisher.afterFinally(Runnable)) will execute after this filter invokes Scope.close() and therefore will not see the Span for the current request/response.
